This game is fucking awesome and addicting, but In my opinion you will find yourself growing angrier and angrier at life the more you play this game. The community is god-awful. There's no other reason to play this game other than to just talk shit and dick on your teammates. There's absolutely no point of getting seriously into this game at this time unless they fix the cheating problem and the competitive community sees light. It's not fun to play unless you have 4 teamates to play with a lot. The games been out for a while and really could use a new coat of paint in terms of maps and trying to seperate toxic players from serious players.
Gran juego, entretenido y muy competitivo a pesar de los años, super recomendable para cualquiera, te engancha facil.
great game it is fun. it is a classic game that is fun
It's fun to play, you can measure your angry level and learn how to speak russian
Интересная игра с кончеными турками и поляками

What I had before this game:
-a table without even 1 scratch
-a fully functional mouse
-no aggression problems
-a clean vocabulary without any bad words
-enough sleep
-real life friends

What I have now after playing this game 800 hours:
-a broken table with a hole in it
-a broken mouse
-aggression problems
-I am also fluent in russian now
-5 Hours of sleep every night
-A bad vocabulary in literally every language I know
-Steam friends

Do I still recommend this game?
Ye :)
